page.title: 08Leisure Activities.
page.content:
Below is a list, in order of popularity, showing the activities and number of children who take part in them.These represent nearly all the 11 year olds in the area. (33)
Activity {Nos.} Activity{ } {Nos. Television {33} Youth club { 16 Music {33} Car/Train set {15 Snowballing {33 }Cricket {14 Animals { 27 }Football {14 Rambling {26} Tennis {13 Draw/Paint { 25 }Darts/Snooker {12 Reading {25 }Gardening {11 Board games {25} Horse Riding{ 6 Swimming { 23 }Fishing { 6 Bicycling { 22 }Sailing {6 Computer {22} Canoeing{ 5 Conkers {22 }Dancing {3 Skating {17 }Golf {3 Modelling { 16 }
